item.title: She advanced DEI at her university. Her son-in-law, JD Vance, wants to end it.
item.description: Lakshmi Chilukuri helped create a pilot course on race, ethnicity and gender in biology and medicine.

item.title: Tugboat captain on how two massive ships collided at sea

item.title: Ban on helicopter traffic around D.C. airport expanded in wake of American Airlines crash
item.description: A ban has been expanded on helicopters operating along the route involved in January's deadly mid-air collision near Washington's Reagan National Airp...

item.title: Man who searched killing an "illegal immigrant" online arrested in murder of fiancé
item.description: Ty Vaughn, 31, allegedly shot and killed his fiancé hours after searching "is it illegal to kill an illegal immigrant."

item.title: Details on changes to Southwest's checked bags policy
